intro: Reutera tenuis, commonly known as the slender reutera, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and small, opposite leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale pink, with five petals and a prominent tube shape. Reutera tenuis is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests.
